title: Funny poses for summer vacation photos
content: What kinds of pictures do you take on summer trips? Pictures of people jumping are really big, but I always think it's funny when people take pictures and pretend like they're falling. I have to take one whenever I’m doing anything remotely outdoorsy or adventurous. It’s kinda like how everyone who visits the Leaning Tower of Pisa has to get a picture of them pushing it back into place. When Alan went bouldering a few weeks ago, he sent me this one and I nearly died. But after I realized it was fake, my worry turned into being really impressed—it looks so real! What are your favorite funny poses?
